sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Director: Benjamin Christensen
Stars: Thelma Todd, Creighton Hale, Laska Winter
Writer: Abraham Merritt
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TUzR3YhpzxOuBM6YrZ91UVG
üçï SILENT ERA TOUR de SAUCEüçï
Welcome to the nightmare world of Benjamin Christensen‚Äîthe Danish filmmaker revered for his bizarre silent classic H√§xan. 

During his brief but unforgettable stint in Hollywood, Christensen conjured a trilogy of films, each starring his muse, the mesmerizing Thelma Todd. Sadly, only one of these haunting works survives: tonight‚Äôs surreal descent into madness‚Äîthat still, nearly a century later, refuses to be bound by genre limitations. 

Whether you're a fan of classic horror, silent film history, or the twisted tales of 1920s cinema, this film offers a glimpse into a fascinating era of filmmaking.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

üçïSubscribe to PizzaFLIX for more timeless gems from the Golden Age of Hollywood! Don‚Äôt forget to like, comment, and share if you love vintage cinema.üçï

metadata.Plot: A young man of society wants to make an expedition to Africa, but his fianc√©e asks him for help about one of her fathers guests shortly before his planed departure. Her suspects about that guest were serious, this man tries to steal one of her fathers rubin, and she and her fiance are kidnapped and brought to a house, where strange things happen. The whole thing becomes a nightmare under the direction of a mysterious Mr. Satan.
metadata.Writer: Abraham Merritt, Benjamin Christensen, Cornell Woolrich
metadata.Actors: Thelma Todd, Creighton Hale, Sheldon Lewis
